product_name: MOON Take a Hike: Salt Lake City
long_description: Immerse yourself in the beauty of Salt Lake City's surrounding mountains with the help of MOON Take a Hike: Salt Lake City. It offers 75 hikes within a 2-hour drive of downtown.
short_description: Immerse yourself in the beauty of Salt Lake City's surrounding mountains with the help of MOON Take a Hike: Salt Lake City. It offers 75 hikes within a 2-hour drive of downtown.
